title: Location-based Live Support
content:
The location-based Live Support feature adds functionality to the Live Support page.

  • By default, location-based Live Support is enabled for a new tenant, and disabled for an upgraded tenant.

  • To enable location-based Live Support, use the following PUT command with the REST API:

    PUT../rest/100000001/feature-flags/cti/enableCtiLocationMode/true

    For more information about the REST API, see Develop.

Related topics

  • How to deal with a Live Support call with location-based support enabled
